property.name: sql
property.value: select n.id as id, n.USER_NAME as user_name, n.TYPE_OF_CERTIFICATE as type_of_certificate, n.LICENSE_NUMBER as license_number, n.CARD_TYPE as card_type, n.ACCOUNT as account, n.PHONE_NUMBER as phone_number, n.STATUS as status, n.FAILURE as failure, n.CREATE_TIME as create_time, n.SUCCESS_TIME as success_time, n.OWNER_ID as owner_id from name_list n where 1=1 /~userName: and n.USER_NAME = '[userName]'~/ /~licenseNumber: and n.LICENSE_NUMBER = '[licenseNumber]'~/ /~account: and n.ACCOUNT = '[account]'~/ /~phoneNumber: and n.PHONE_NUMBER = '[phoneNumber]'~/ /~typeOfCertificate: and n.TYPE_OF_CERTIFICATE = '[typeOfCertificate]'~/ /~cardType: and n.CARD_TYPE = '[cardType]'~/ /~createTimeStart: and n.CREATE_TIME >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and n.CREATE_TIME <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/ /~ownerId: and n.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/

property.name: sql
property.value: select n.id as id, n.USER_NAME as user_name, n.TYPE_OF_CERTIFICATE as type_of_certificate, n.LICENSE_NUMBER as license_number, n.CARD_TYPE as card_type, n.ACCOUNT as account, n.PHONE_NUMBER as phone_number, n.STATUS as status, n.FAILURE as failure, n.CREATE_TIME as create_time, n.SUCCESS_TIME as success_time, n.OWNER_ID as owner_id from name_list n where 1=1 /~userName: and n.USER_NAME = '[userName]'~/ /~licenseNumber: and n.LICENSE_NUMBER = '[licenseNumber]'~/ /~account: and n.ACCOUNT = '[account]'~/ /~phoneNumber: and n.PHONE_NUMBER = '[phoneNumber]'~/ /~ownerId: and n.OWNER_ID = '[ownerId]'~/ /~typeOfCertificate: and n.TYPE_OF_CERTIFICATE = '[typeOfCertificate]'~/ /~cardType: and n.CARD_TYPE = '[cardType]'~/ /~createTimeStart: and n.CREATE_TIME >= to_date('[createTimeStart] 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ~/ /~createTimeEnd: and n.CREATE_TIME <= to_date('[createTimeEnd] 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')~/

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT r.PAYER_BANK_NO as payer_bank_no, r.OWNER_ID as customer_no, r.RECEIVE_ID as receive_id, r.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, r.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, r.ACC_TYPE as acc_type, r.ACC_NO_TYPE as acc_no_type, r.AMOUNT as amount, r.FEE as fee, r.COST as cost, r.CREATE_TIME as create_time, r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME as last_update_time, r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE as certificates_type, r.CERTIFICATES_CODE as certificates_code, r.ORDER_STATUS as order_status, r.CLEARING_STATUS as clear_status FROM RECEIVE_REQUEST r WHERE 1 = 1 /~payer_bank_no: and r.PAYER_BANK_NO = '[payer_bank_no]' ~/ /~customer_no: and r.OWNER_ID = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~receive_id: and r.RECEIVE_ID = '[receive_id]' ~/ /~account_no: and r.ACCOUNT_NO = '[account_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and r.ACCOUNT_NAME = '[account_name]' ~/ /~acc_type: and r.ACC_TYPE = '[acc_type]' ~/ /~acc_no_type: and r.ACC_NO_TYPE = '[acc_no_type]' ~/ /~amount_start: and r.AMOUNT >= [amount_start] ~/ /~amount_end: and r.AMOUNT <= [amount_end] ~/ /~fee_start: and r.FEE >= [fee_start] ~/ /~fee_end: and r.FEE <= [fee_end] ~/ /~cost_start: and r.COST >= [cost_start] ~/ /~cost_end: and r.COST <= [cost_end] ~/ /~create_time_start: and r.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and r.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~last_update_time_start: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[last_update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_end: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[last_update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~certificates_type: and r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE = '[certificates_type]' ~/ /~certificates_code: and r.CERTIFICATES_CODE = '[CERTIFICATES_CODE]' ~/ /~order_status: and r.ORDER_STATUS = '[order_status]' ~/ /~clear_status: and r.CLEARING_STATUS = '[clear_status]' ~/ ORDER BY r.CREATE_TIME DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT sum(r.AMOUNT) as amount , sum(r.FEE) as fee , sum(r.COST) as cost, count(*) as ordercount FROM RECEIVE_REQUEST r WHERE 1=1 /~payer_bank_no: and r.PAYER_BANK_NO = '[payer_bank_no]' ~/ /~customer_no: and r.OWNER_ID = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~receive_id: and r.RECEIVE_ID = '[receive_id]' ~/ /~account_no: and r.ACCOUNT_NO = '[account_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and r.ACCOUNT_NAME = '[account_name]' ~/ /~acc_type: and r.ACC_TYPE = '[acc_type]' ~/ /~acc_no_type: and r.ACC_NO_TYPE = '[acc_no_type]' ~/ /~amount_start: and r.AMOUNT >= [amount_start] ~/ /~amount_end: and r.AMOUNT <= [amount_end] ~/ /~fee_start: and r.FEE >= [fee_start] ~/ /~fee_end: and r.FEE <= [fee_end] ~/ /~cost_start: and r.COST >= [cost_start] ~/ /~cost_end: and r.COST <= [cost_end] ~/ /~create_time_start: and r.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and r.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~last_update_time_start: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[last_update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_end: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[last_update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~certificates_type: and r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE = '[certificates_type]' ~/ /~certificates_code: and r.CERTIFICATES_CODE = '[CERTIFICATES_CODE]' ~/ /~order_status: and r.ORDER_STATUS = '[order_status]' ~/ /~clear_status: and r.CLEARING_STATUS = '[clear_status]' ~/

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT r.PAYER_BANK_NO as payer_bank_no, r.OWNER_ID as customer_no, r.RECEIVE_ID as receive_id, r.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, r.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, r.ACC_TYPE as acc_type, r.ACC_NO_TYPE as acc_no_type, r.AMOUNT as amount, r.FEE as fee, r.CREATE_TIME as create_time, r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME as last_update_time, r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE as certificates_type, r.CERTIFICATES_CODE as certificates_code, r.ORDER_STATUS as order_status, r.CLEARING_STATUS as clear_status FROM RECEIVE_REQUEST r WHERE 1 = 1 /~payer_bank_no: and r.PAYER_BANK_NO = '[payer_bank_no]' ~/ /~customer_no: and r.OWNER_ID = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~receive_id: and r.RECEIVE_ID = '[receive_id]' ~/ /~account_no: and r.ACCOUNT_NO = '[account_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and r.ACCOUNT_NAME = '[account_name]' ~/ /~acc_type: and r.ACC_TYPE = '[acc_type]' ~/ /~acc_no_type: and r.ACC_NO_TYPE = '[acc_no_type]' ~/ /~amount_start: and r.AMOUNT >= [amount_start] ~/ /~amount_end: and r.AMOUNT <= [amount_end] ~/ /~fee_start: and r.FEE >= [fee_start] ~/ /~fee_end: and r.FEE <= [fee_end] ~/ /~create_time_start: and r.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and r.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~last_update_time_start: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[last_update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_end: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[last_update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~certificates_type: and r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE = '[certificates_type]' ~/ /~certificates_code: and r.CERTIFICATES_CODE = '[CERTIFICATES_CODE]' ~/ /~order_status: and r.ORDER_STATUS = '[order_status]' ~/ /~clear_status: and r.CLEARING_STATUS = '[clear_status]' ~/ ORDER BY r.CREATE_TIME DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT r.OWNER_ID as owner_id, r.DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT as daily_max_amount, r.SINGLE_BATCH_MAX_NUM as single_batch_max_num, r.SINGLE_MAX_AMOUNT as single_max_amount, r.PRIVATE_CER as private_cer, r.PUBLIC_CER as public_cer, r.IS_CHECK_CONTRACT as is_check_contract, r.CREATE_TIME as create_time, r.STATUS as status, r.REMARK as remark, r.VERSION as version, r.DOMAIN as domain, r.CUST_IP as cust_ip, r.OPER as oper FROM RECEIVE_CONFIG r WHERE 1 = 1 /~owner_id: and r.OWNER_ID = '[owner_id]' ~/ /~status: and r.STATUS = '[status]' ~/ /~applyDate1: AND Date(r.CREATE_TIME) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~applyDate2: AND Date(r.CREATE_TIME) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY r.id DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT r.OWNER_ID as owner_id, r.DAILY_MAX_AMOUNT as daily_max_amount, r.SINGLE_BATCH_MAX_NUM as single_batch_max_num, r.SINGLE_MAX_AMOUNT as single_max_amount, r.PRIVATE_CER as private_cer, r.PUBLIC_CER as public_cer, r.IS_CHECK_CONTRACT as is_check_contract, r.CREATE_TIME as create_time, r.STATUS as status, r.REMARK as remark, r.VERSION as version, r.DOMAIN as domain, r.CUST_IP as cust_ip, r.OPER as oper FROM RECEIVE_CONFIG_HISTORY r WHERE 1 = 1 /~owner_id: and r.OWNER_ID = '[owner_id]' ~/ /~status: and r.STATUS = '[status]' ~/ /~applyDate1: AND Date(r.CREATE_TIME) >= str_to_date('[applyDate1] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~applyDate2: AND Date(r.CREATE_TIME) <= str_to_date('[applyDate2] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ ORDER BY r.id DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT r.PAYER_BANK_NO as payer_bank_no, r.OWNER_ID as customer_no, r.RECEIVE_ID as receive_id, r.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, r.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, r.ACC_TYPE as acc_type, r.ACC_NO_TYPE as acc_no_type, r.AMOUNT as amount, r.FEE as fee, r.COST as cost, r.CREATE_TIME as create_time, r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME as last_update_time, r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE as certificates_type, r.CERTIFICATES_CODE as certificates_code, r.ORDER_STATUS as order_status, r.CLEARING_STATUS as clear_status FROM RECEIVE_REQUEST r WHERE 1 = 1 /~payer_bank_no: and r.PAYER_BANK_NO = '[payer_bank_no]' ~/ /~customer_no: and r.OWNER_ID = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~receive_id: and r.RECEIVE_ID = '[receive_id]' ~/ /~account_no: and r.ACCOUNT_NO = '[account_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and r.ACCOUNT_NAME = '[account_name]' ~/ /~acc_type: and r.ACC_TYPE = '[acc_type]' ~/ /~acc_no_type: and r.ACC_NO_TYPE = '[acc_no_type]' ~/ /~amount_start: and r.AMOUNT >= [amount_start] ~/ /~amount_end: and r.AMOUNT <= [amount_end] ~/ /~fee_start: and r.FEE >= [fee_start] ~/ /~fee_end: and r.FEE <= [fee_end] ~/ /~cost_start: and r.COST >= [cost_start] ~/ /~cost_end: and r.COST <= [cost_end] ~/ /~create_time_start: and r.CREATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and r.CREATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_start: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[last_update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_end: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[last_update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~certificates_type: and r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE = '[certificates_type]' ~/ /~certificates_code: and r.CERTIFICATES_CODE = '[CERTIFICATES_CODE]' ~/ /~order_status: and r.ORDER_STATUS = '[order_status]' ~/ /~clear_status: and r.CLEARING_STATUS = '[clear_status]' ~/ ORDER BY r.CREATE_TIME DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT sum(r.AMOUNT) as amount , sum(r.FEE) as fee , sum(r.COST) as cost, count(*) as ordercount FROM RECEIVE_REQUEST r WHERE 1=1 /~payer_bank_no: and r.PAYER_BANK_NO = '[payer_bank_no]' ~/ /~customer_no: and r.OWNER_ID = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~receive_id: and r.RECEIVE_ID = '[receive_id]' ~/ /~account_no: and r.ACCOUNT_NO = '[account_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and r.ACCOUNT_NAME = '[account_name]' ~/ /~acc_type: and r.ACC_TYPE = '[acc_type]' ~/ /~acc_no_type: and r.ACC_NO_TYPE = '[acc_no_type]' ~/ /~amount_start: and r.AMOUNT >= [amount_start] ~/ /~amount_end: and r.AMOUNT <= [amount_end] ~/ /~fee_start: and r.FEE >= [fee_start] ~/ /~fee_end: and r.FEE <= [fee_end] ~/ /~cost_start: and r.COST >= [cost_start] ~/ /~cost_end: and r.COST <= [cost_end] ~/ /~create_time_start: and r.CREATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and r.CREATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_start: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[last_update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_end: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[last_update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~certificates_type: and r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE = '[certificates_type]' ~/ /~certificates_code: and r.CERTIFICATES_CODE = '[CERTIFICATES_CODE]' ~/ /~order_status: and r.ORDER_STATUS = '[order_status]' ~/ /~clear_status: and r.CLEARING_STATUS = '[clear_status]' ~/

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT r.PAYER_BANK_NO as payer_bank_no, r.OWNER_ID as customer_no, r.RECEIVE_ID as receive_id, r.ACCOUNT_NO as account_no, r.ACCOUNT_NAME as account_name, r.ACC_TYPE as acc_type, r.ACC_NO_TYPE as acc_no_type, r.AMOUNT as amount, r.FEE as fee, r.COST as cost, r.CREATE_TIME as create_time, r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME as last_update_time, r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE as certificates_type, r.CERTIFICATES_CODE as certificates_code, r.ORDER_STATUS as order_status, r.CLEARING_STATUS as clear_status FROM RECEIVE_REQUEST r WHERE 1 = 1 /~payer_bank_no: and r.PAYER_BANK_NO = '[payer_bank_no]' ~/ /~customer_no: and r.OWNER_ID = '[customer_no]' ~/ /~receive_id: and r.RECEIVE_ID = '[receive_id]' ~/ /~account_no: and r.ACCOUNT_NO = '[account_no]' ~/ /~account_name: and r.ACCOUNT_NAME = '[account_name]' ~/ /~acc_type: and r.ACC_TYPE = '[acc_type]' ~/ /~acc_no_type: and r.ACC_NO_TYPE = '[acc_no_type]' ~/ /~amount_start: and r.AMOUNT >= [amount_start] ~/ /~amount_end: and r.AMOUNT <= [amount_end] ~/ /~fee_start: and r.FEE >= [fee_start] ~/ /~fee_end: and r.FEE <= [fee_end] ~/ /~cost_start: and r.COST >= [cost_start] ~/ /~cost_end: and r.COST <= [cost_end] ~/ /~create_time_start: and r.create_time >= str_to_date('[create_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~create_time_end: and r.create_time <= str_to_date('[create_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')~/ /~last_update_time_start: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME >= str_to_date('[last_update_time_start] 00:00:00','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~last_update_time_end: and r.LAST_UPDATE_TIME <= str_to_date('[last_update_time_end] 23:59:59','%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ~/ /~certificates_type: and r.CERTIFICATES_TYPE = '[certificates_type]' ~/ /~certificates_code: and r.CERTIFICATES_CODE = '[CERTIFICATES_CODE]' ~/ /~order_status: and r.ORDER_STATUS = '[order_status]' ~/ /~clear_status: and r.CLEARING_STATUS = '[clear_status]' ~/ ORDER BY r.CREATE_TIME DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT rc.ID as id, rc.CREATE_DATE as create_date, rc.CODE as code, rc.NAME as name, rc.ROUTE_INFO as route_info, rc.STATUS as status FROM ROUTE_CONFIG rc where 1=1 /~code:and rc.CODE = '[code]' ~/ /~name:and rc.NAME = '[name]' ~/ /~status:and rc.STATUS = '[status]' ~/ order by rc.ID desc
